name: Purrate Purrsuit
description:
Cap'n Bachata wants 'is loot 'n 'e wants it quick!
Plunder the ships as fast as ye can t' get t' the barrr in Tortuga Island by nightfall. Will ye become the richest gentleman o' fortune?

Use A an' D keys or the controller portside stick to steer yer ship an' the W key or the A controller button fer forward. Pursue ships an' use yer 'ook (RB/R1 on controller) to board those! Loot as many as ye can before the timer runs out to get the 'igh score.

Originally intended fer the Space Jam #1, development will 'opefully be completed shortly.
